Address.label: Address
Address.value: FIVE AMERICAN LANE, GREENWICH, 06831, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: QXO is the largest publicly traded distributor of roofing, waterproofing, and complementary building products in the United States. The company plans to become the tech-enabled leader in the 800 billion Dollars building products distribution industry and generate outsized value for shareholders. QXO is targeting 50 billion Dollars in annual revenues within the next decade through accretive acquisitions and organic growth.
